00022 //! analog of the Glue class, intended for Cube objects
00023 template<typename T1, typename T2, typename glue_type>
00024 class GlueCube : public BaseCube<typename T1::elem_type, GlueCube<T1, T2, glue_type> >
00025   {
00026   public:
00027   
00028   typedef typename T1::elem_type                   elem_type;
00029   typedef typename get_pod_type<elem_type>::result pod_type;
00030 
00031   arma_inline  GlueCube(const BaseCube<typename T1::elem_type, T1>& in_A, const BaseCube<typename T1::elem_type, T2>& in_B);
00032   arma_inline ~GlueCube();
00033   
00034   const T1& A;  //!< first operand
00035   const T2& B;  //!< second operand
00036   
00037   };
